and <S%H6086>timbers<s%> of <S%H730>cedar<s%> logs <S%H369>beyond<s%> <S%H4557>number,<s%> for the <S%H6722>Sidonians<s%> and <S%H6876>Tyrians<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H7230>large<s%> <S%H7230>quantities<s%> of <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>timber<s%> to <S%H1732>David.<s%>

"But the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'You have <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H7230>much<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and have <S%H6213>waged<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4421>wars;<s%> you shall not <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> to My <S%H8034>name,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you have <S%H8210>shed<s%> [so] <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me.

<S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> shall be <S%H3205>born<s%> to you, <S%H1931>who<s%> shall be a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4496>rest;<s%> and I will <S%H5117>give<s%> him <S%H5117>rest<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H340>enemies<s%> on <S%H5439>every<s%> <S%H5439>side;<s%> for his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> and <S%H8253>quiet<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in his <S%H3117>days.<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now,<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> be with you that you may be <S%H6743>successful,<s%> and <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as He has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> you.

<S%H389>"Only<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H7922>discretion<s%> and <S%H998>understanding,<s%> and <S%H6680>give<s%> you <S%H6680>charge<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> so that you may <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H227>"Then<s%> you shall <S%H6743>prosper,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you are <S%H8104>careful<s%> to <S%H6213>observe<s%> the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H553>courageous,<s%> do not <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> be <S%H2865>dismayed.<s%>

"Now <S%H2009>behold,<s%> with <S%H6040>great<s%> <S%H6040>pains<s%> I have <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> 100000 <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and 1000000 <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H5178>bronze<s%> and <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H369>beyond<s%> <S%H4948>weight,<s%> for they are in <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H7230>quantity;<s%> also <S%H6086>timber<s%> and <S%H68>stone<s%> I have <S%H3559>prepared,<s%> and you may <S%H3254>add<s%> to them.

For He has <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> into my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H3533>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> His <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> <S%H5414>set<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and your <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H6965>arise,<s%> therefore, and <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> so that you may <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> that is to be <S%H1129>built<s%> for the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"
